9 float linear_x_button=0;
10 float angular_z_button=0;
11 float linear_x_stick=0;
12 float angular_z_stick=0;
13 
14 bool stick_up_down_pressed=false;
15 bool stick_left_right_pressed=false;
16 bool button_up_down_pressed=false;
17 bool button_left_right_pressed=false;
18 
19 // Defines
20 #define Joystick_Stick_Left_Right msg->axes[4]
21 #define Joystick_Stick_Up_Down msg->axes[5]
22 #define Joystick_Button_Left_Right msg->axes[0]
23 #define Joystick_Button_Up_Down msg->axes[1]
24 
25 // Callback Functions
26 void Joy_Callback (const sensor_msgs::Joy::ConstPtr& msg)
27 {
28 // for (unsigned i = 0; i < msg->axes.size(); ++i) {
29 // ROS_INFO("Axis %d is now at position %f", i, msg->axes[i]);
30 // }
31 
32  // Test if joystick buttons are pressed?
33  if (Joystick_Button_Left_Right>0) {
34  angular_z_button=Joystick_Button_Left_Right;
35  button_left_right_pressed=true;
36  }
37  if (Joystick_Button_Left_Right<0) {
38  angular_z_button=Joystick_Button_Left_Right;
39  button_left_right_pressed=true;
40  }
41  if (Joystick_Button_Up_Down>0) {
42  linear_x_button=Joystick_Button_Up_Down/5;
43  button_up_down_pressed=true;
44  }
45  if (Joystick_Button_Up_Down<0) {
46  linear_x_button=Joystick_Button_Up_Down/5;
47  button_up_down_pressed=true;
48  }
49  if (Joystick_Button_Up_Down==0) {
50  linear_x_button=Joystick_Button_Up_Down;
51  button_up_down_pressed=false;
52  }
53  if (Joystick_Button_Left_Right==0) {
54  angular_z_button=Joystick_Button_Left_Right;
55  button_left_right_pressed=false;
56  }
57 
58  // Test if joystick stick is pressed?
59  if (Joystick_Stick_Left_Right>0) {
60  angular_z_stick=Joystick_Stick_Left_Right;
61  stick_left_right_pressed=true;
62  }
63  if (Joystick_Stick_Left_Right<0) {
64  angular_z_stick=Joystick_Stick_Left_Right;
65  stick_left_right_pressed=true;
66  }
67  if (Joystick_Stick_Up_Down>0) {
68  linear_x_stick=Joystick_Stick_Up_Down/5;
69  stick_up_down_pressed=true;
70  }
71  if (Joystick_Stick_Up_Down<0) {
72  linear_x_stick=Joystick_Stick_Up_Down/5;
73  stick_up_down_pressed=true;
74  }
75  if (Joystick_Stick_Up_Down==0) {
76  linear_x_stick=Joystick_Stick_Up_Down;
77  stick_up_down_pressed=false;
78  }
79  if (Joystick_Stick_Left_Right==0) {
80  angular_z_stick=Joystick_Stick_Left_Right;
81  stick_left_right_pressed=false;
82  }
83 
84 
85 }

87 void onExit( void )
88 {
89  // Run cleanup code here!
90  ROS_INFO("joystick_driver: Exit node");
91 }
92 
93 int main(int argc, char **argv)
94 {
95  atexit(onExit);
96  ros::init(argc, argv, "joystick_driver");
97  ros::NodeHandle n;
98  ros::Subscriber sub = n.subscribe("joy", 100, Joy_Callback);
99  ros::Publisher cmd_vel_pub = n.advertise<geometry_msgs::Twist>("/cmd_vel", 100);
100  ros::Rate loop_rate(50); //Sets the loop to publish at a rate of 10Hz
101  geometry_msgs::Twist cmd_vel_msg; //Declares the message to be sent
102  while (n.ok()){
103 
104  if ((stick_left_right_pressed==false) && (stick_up_down_pressed==false))
105  {
106  if ((cmd_vel_msg.linear.x != linear_x_button) || (cmd_vel_msg.angular.z != angular_z_button)){
107  cmd_vel_msg.linear.x=linear_x_button;
108  cmd_vel_msg.angular.z=angular_z_button;
109  cmd_vel_pub.publish(cmd_vel_msg);
110  ROS_INFO("linear.x = %f angular.z = %f",cmd_vel_msg.linear.x,cmd_vel_msg.angular.z);
111  }
112  }
113  if ((button_left_right_pressed==false) && (button_up_down_pressed==false))
114  {
115  if ((cmd_vel_msg.linear.x != linear_x_stick) || (cmd_vel_msg.angular.z != angular_z_stick)){
116  cmd_vel_msg.linear.x=linear_x_stick;
117  cmd_vel_msg.angular.z=angular_z_stick;
118  cmd_vel_pub.publish(cmd_vel_msg);
119  ROS_INFO("linear.x = %f angular.z = %f",cmd_vel_msg.linear.x,cmd_vel_msg.angular.z);
120  }
121  }
122 
123  ros::spinOnce();
124  loop_rate.sleep();
125  }//end.mainloop
126  return 0;
127 }//end.main
